Class InformationNPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • NPC
        • InformationNPC
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardGameNPC

    public class InformationNPC
extends NPC
    The InformationNPC class is created so that NPCs can be added to the game which the player can talk to if they are lonely.

    InformationNPC

    Date: 2016/06/01

    Version:
    1 2016/06/01
    Author:
    David White and Sepehr Hosseini

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Entity

        animationSprites, DIRECTIONS, EAST, LEFT, NORTH, RIGHT, SOUTH, STANDING, STEPS, WEST

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InformationNPC(java.lang.String character, int x, int y, Sprite dialogueBack, java.lang.String dialogueText)
      This constructs an instance of the InformationNPC class with a specified character model at the specified x and y coordinate with the specified dialogue image and text.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InformationNPC

        public InformationNPC(java.lang.String character,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      Sprite dialogueBack,
                      java.lang.String dialogueText)
        This constructs an instance of the InformationNPC class with a specified character model at the specified x and y coordinate with the specified dialogue image and text.
        Parameters:
        character - the character model of this NPC.
        x - the x coordinate that this NPC will be created at.
        y - the y coordinate that this NPC will be created at.
        dialogueBack - the Sprite that the text will be drawn on.
        dialogueText - the text that will be shown when the character interacts with this NPC.

    • Method Detail

      • setText

        public void setText(java.lang.String dialogueText)
        This method changes the text that will be shown when the NPC is interacted with.
        Parameters:
        dialogueText - the text that will be shown when the character interacts with this NPC.

      • nextLine

        public void nextLine()
        This method increments to the next line of text.

        This method returns true if the text is finished.

      • fullText

        public java.lang.String fullText()
        This method returns the fully unedited InformationNPC text.
        Returns:
        String the fully unedited InformationNPC text.

        Local variables:

        tempString This is a temporary String used to piece together all the Strings in the separate pages.

      • dialogueBack

        public Sprite dialogueBack()
        This method returns the Sprite used to display the text.
        Returns:
        Sprite the background image for the text.

      • interact

        public void interact(OpenWorldPanel panel)
        This is an overriden method which will be called when the NPC is interacted with.
        Specified by:
        interact in class NPC
        Parameters:
        panel - This is the OpenWorldPanel that will be used during the interaction.

      • getType

        public int getType()
        This method is used to return the value of the information npc type.
        Specified by:
        getType in class NPC
        Returns:
        int the value used to store information npcs.
